name: 2021 3rd International Conference on Big Data Engineering and Technology（BDET 2021）
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series by ACM (ISBN: 978-1-4503-8928-0 ). All papers will be archived in ACM Online Digital Library, and indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus and submitted to be reviewed by Thomson Reuters Conference Proceedings Citation Index (ISI Web of Science).
